LanguageData.MealSausage_Westerado.label: sausage
LanguageData.MealSausage_Westerado.description: A mixture of pork protein, protected by a layer of skin.
LanguageData.SmokedJerky_Westerado.label: smoked jerky
LanguageData.SmokedJerky_Westerado.description: A preserved mashed mixture of fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.MealChiliPot_Westerado.label: pot of chili
LanguageData.MealChiliPot_Westerado.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
